author: The Editorial Board
title: The Mattis Budget Rebuke
text:
Congress spent Tuesday working on a budget deal to avoid another government shutdown, and one adult on Capitol Hill was Defense Secretary Jim Mattis, who ripped America’s representatives for failing to provide reliable funding for the military.
Mr. Mattis testified at the House Armed Services Committee about the 2018 defense strategy, among other topics, but noted with some acidity: “Congress mandated, rightfully mandated, this National Defense Strategy—the first one in a decade—and then shut down the government the day of...
